response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us, but we understand its value might be perceived differently based on your needs. We're offering it to you for $120, which includes a special discount tailored for potential buyers like yourself. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a product that could significantly enhance your experience. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 120}
